timeline.message: Move common mpJwt files to shared project
Update FAT logging for repeat actions
Update mpJwt-1.1 FAT project for restructuring
Update mpJwt-1.2 FAT project for restructuring
fix file sharing between mpJwt Fat projects

timeline.bodyText: I'm guessing this still works with the // in the path?
timeline.author: ayoho

replies.bodyText: It works - but since I need to merge with Jesse's changes, I've removed the extra "/".
replies.author: c00crane

timeline.bodyText: Not going to try these tests with the MP JWT features anymore?
timeline.author: ayoho

replies.bodyText: Had commented out the extra runs while I was testing with Jesse's changes to the runner - I shouldn't have delivered that file with those updates.  I've re-enabled.
replies.author: c00crane

timeline.bodyText: Not entirely sure if this is necessary.
timeline.author: ayoho

timeline.bodyText: Is this simply printing out the name and number of the tasks being performed?
timeline.author: ayoho

replies.bodyText: Yes -it's for debugging the gradle build - I've commented it out (left the code block as it's not an obvious thing to add to debug)
